name: RoShamBo ++
description:
What if you were given a chance to play a game?
What if that game is a simple game of Rock-Paper-Scissors?
What if that simple game becomes a gamble?
And what if your currency in the gamble is your life?

How wisely will you use it? How much will you give up? How much will you gain? 
To win the deadly game of RoShamBo!

A strategy game bending the rules and giving the classic game of RoShamBo a twist. Use your life wisely and drain your enemy's life to death; Avoid your own death and play your cards right!

Made for the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam for the Compo Category. 

Huge thanks to the awesome folks at Unity for the Unity Game Engine! 
Hope you enjoy playing this game, made with coffee, sleepless nights, and love
